articles.description: In an overtime thriller, RJ Barrett had his worst shooting night of the season, and Cam Reddish arose from the grave to (almost) save his Canadian bacon.
articles.content:
Oh, basketball, too long have we spent apart.
On Wednesday night, the New York Knicks (0-1) started their season by traveling to the banks of the mighty Mississippi for a match-up with the Memphis G… [+7431 chars]

articles.author: From NBA.com News Services
articles.title: Paolo Banchero leads way as rookies deliver in NBA debuts - NBA.com
articles.description: A throng of rookies made their NBA debuts on Wednesday, led by a strong showing from No. 1 overall pick Paolo Banchero.
articles.content:
Rookie Paolo Banchero did not disappoint in his regular-season debut with the Magic.
Wednesday night was the first “full” night of games in the NBA, with 24 of the league’s 30 teams in action. In ad… [+4461 chars]

articles.author: Sam Smith
articles.title: DeRozan's 37 points powers Bulls to 1-0 start in Miami - NBA.com
articles.description: Without Zach LaVine and Lonzo Ball, it was All-Star DeMar DeRozan scoring 28 of his game-high 37 points in the second-half to lead the Bulls to a 116-108 victory against the Heat on Wednesday night.
articles.content:
So how do you like those Bulls now?
Opening on the road against last years Eastern Conference wins leader who swept the Bulls by an average of 15 points per game last season, playing without starter… [+10632 chars]

articles.title: NHL Highlights | Flyers vs. Panthers - October 19, 2022 - SPORTSNET
articles.description: Carter Verehaeghe scored a pair of goals and Sergei Bobrovsky turned aside 31 shots as the Florida Panthers edged the Philadelphia Flyers 4-3.
